author: callyfromauron
title: QA-DAO Transcription Service
description: Without transcription, timestamps, or summaries, the Zoom videos of community events are  inaccessible and difficult to communicate.
solution: Transcribe, time-stamp and summarise the Zoom videos of key community events, making them accessible, searchable, and translatable.
experience: The QA-DAO team are skilled transcribers and editors, and are already successfully transcribing Catalyst Circle meetings. Details below.
